data.name: Infinite World:Dice Team
data.detailed_description:
This game is a roguelite infinite theme game.
In the game, players need to form a team, build characters, use dice to fight, combine skills based on the dice results, get rewards, and become stronger to defeat the final BOSS.
Infinite theme:Contains infinite elements, including: XiuZhen, fantasy, WuXia, science fiction, history, legend, myth and so on.
Strengthening resources: Players can obtain 400+ strengthening resources of various levels in the game.
Free character build: bloodlines, transformations, gong, skills, weapons, armors, strange objects, use strengthening resources for role build, and build an ideal role.
Use dice to combine skills: Use dice to fight and combine skills based on the results of the dice.

data.short_description: This game is a roguelite infinite theme game. In the game, players need to form a team, build characters, use dice to fight, combine skills based on the dice results, get rewards, and become stronger to defeat the final BOSS.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
